13:12:13</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx; var stdout = tx.output;
try { output = JSON.parse(stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash tx.transaction_fee = output.record.transactionFee
tx.serials = output.receipt.serials
if (output.receipt.serials.toString() != "") { var nft = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_nft") nft.initialize() nft.name = output.receipt.serials.toString() + "@" + tx.token.token_id.toString() nft.serial = output.receipt.serials.toString() nft.token = tx.token nft.insert() }
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") }
} catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update() }
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 11:24:42</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx
var token = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_token') token.get(tx.token)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli token mint'
if (token.token_id) { cmd = cmd + ' --tokenid ' + token.token_id } if (tx.amount) { cmd = cmd + ' --amount ' + tx.amount } if (tx.metadata) { cmd = cmd + " --metadata '" + tx.metadata +"'" }
k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',')
for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) { kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_key') kk.get(k[i]) cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 11:24:57</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx
var token = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_token') token.get(tx.token)
var cmd = 'cd ' + gs.getProperty('x_snc_hspoke.hcli_home') + ' && node hcli token mint'
if (token.token_id) { cmd = cmd + ' --tokenid ' + token.token_id } if (tx.amount) { cmd = cmd + ' --amount ' + tx.amount } if (tx.metadata) { cmd = cmd + " --metadata '" + tx.metadata +"'" }
k = tx.sign_with.toString().split(',')
for (i = 0; i < k.length; i++) { kk = new GlideRecord('x_snc_hspoke_key') kk.get(k[i]) cmd = cmd + ' --sign ' + kk.public_key }
outputs.cmd = cmd
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value 13:12:19</sys_updated_on><value>(function execute(inputs, outputs) {
var tx = inputs.tx; var stdout = tx.output;
try { output = JSON.parse(stdout)
tx.transaction_id = output.resp.transactionId tx.transaction_hash = output.resp.transactionHash tx.transaction_fee = output.record.transactionFee
tx.serials = output.receipt.serials
if (output.receipt.serials.toString() != "") { var nft = new GlideRecord("x_snc_hspoke_nft") nft.initialize() nft.name = output.receipt.serials.toString() + "@" + tx.token.token_id.toString() nft.serial = output.receipt.serials.toString() nft.token = tx.token nft.insert() }
if (output.receipt.status == 'SUCCESS') { tx.status = 'completed' tx.hedera_status = output.receipt.status } else { throw Error("Hedera status is not success") }
} catch (e) { tx.out_parsing_log = e.toString() tx.hedera_status = output.error.status tx.status = 'failed' } finally { tx.update() }
})(inputs, outputs); </value><variable display_value="Script">71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b</variable></sys_variable_value><sys_variable_value
